mapper.select: select t.id, t.username, t.password, t.nickname, t.enabled, p.code as "permission.code" from k_user t left join k_user_role ur on ur.user_id = t.id left join k_role_permission rp on rp.role_id = ur.role_id left join k_permission p on rp.permission_id = p.id where t.deleted = '${@cn.koala.data.domain.YesNo@NO.name()}' and t.username = #{username}
